# Job

**Structure**

Deprecated equivalent of [doc://com.apple.Swift/documentation/Swift/ExecutorJob].

## Declaration

```swift
@frozen struct Job
```

## Overview

A unit of schedulable work.

Unless you’re implementing a scheduler, you don’t generally interact with jobs directly.

## Initializers

- **init(_:)**
- **init(_:)**

## Instance Properties

- **description**
- **priority**

## Instance Methods

- **runSynchronously(on:)**: Run this job on the passed in executor.

## Conforms To

- Sendable
- SendableMetatype

items.description: Run this job on the passed in executor.
items.name: runSynchronously(on:)
